function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban densification leading to concentration of apartment housing in urban centers","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to close proximity and high population density","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, improving ventilation systems, and promoting outdoor spaces for social distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, advanced ventilation systems, contactless entry systems","People":"Residents of apartment buildings, urban dwellers","Owner":"Local government, property owners, architects"},{"Description":"Lack of restorative environmental design in apartment housing","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health of residents, leading to higher susceptibility to disease","Mitigation":"Incorporating restorative design principles, such as natural ventilation and biophilic design, into building plans","Technologies":"Operable windows, biophilic design elements, green spaces","People":"Architects, building developers, urban planners","Owner":"Property developers, city planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Historical examples of poor housing design leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Risk of repeating history with inadequate housing design in response to pandemics, leading to increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Learning from historical mistakes, implementing modern health and safety standards in housing design","Technologies":"Building monitoring systems, modern ventilation technologies, smart building materials","People":"Architects, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, city planners, building developers"}]}
